queries.title: Bulk Search Queries
queries.description: Multiple search queries to scrape (alternative to single query)

provider.title: SERP Provider
provider.description: Select the SERP provider to use

providerKey.title: Provider API Key
providerKey.description: API key for the selected provider (can also be set via PROVIDER_KEY environment variable)

ll.title: Location Coordinates (Maps only)
ll.description: Latitude, longitude and zoom level for maps search (e.g., @40.7207245,-74.1093222,10.61z)

domain.title: Domain Filter
domain.description: Optional domain to filter and track (e.g., https://lkyurology.com/ or lkyurology.com). When specified, stops at first match and saves summary.

maxResults.title: Max Results
maxResults.description: Maximum number of results to retrieve before stopping (0 = unlimited)
